question: Has anyone researched if they are doing research to see if cord blood can cure Hashimoto's or other auto-immune diseases?I've read about cures for lupus and MS by using cord blood, they are also doing heavy research for using cord blood to cure diabetes. If they can do these things with it then i'm sure at some point they can do Hashimoto's.It might be too late for some of our damaged thyroid glands but maybe our children or grandchildren will benefit eh?
title: Scientific minds...
